plot: Kain is 15 years old and has isolated himself from the outside world. He looks at life and no longer cooperates. We see him walking around on a strange school party, ready to explode...There is a girl, but no hope.
title: Übertijd
plot_es: Kain is 15 years old and has isolated himself from the outside world. He looks at life and no longer cooperates. We see him walking around on a strange school party, ready to explode...There is a girl, but no hope.
